member.name: T:CSharpWars.Model.Arena
member.summary: Model class representing the arena dimensions.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Arena.Width
member.summary: The width of the arena in number of tiles.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Arena.Height
member.summary: The height of the arena in number of tiles.

member.name: T:CSharpWars.Model.Bot
member.summary: Model class representing a bot in an active game.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.Id
member.summary: A unique identifier for this bot.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.Name
member.summary: A name representing this bot.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.X
member.summary: The location on the X-ax in the arena this bot is occupying.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.Y
member.summary: The location on the Y-ax in the arena this bot is occupying.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.Orientation
member.summary: The orientation this bot is facing.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.MaximumStamina
member.summary: The maximum stamina this bot has available.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.CurrentStamina
member.summary: The current stamina this bot has left.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.Move
member.summary: The current move this bot is performing.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.Memory
member.summary: The JSON serialized memory this bot is storing.

member.name: P:CSharpWars.Model.Bot.Script
member.summary: A Base64 encoded C# script containing the logic that needs to be executed by this bot.
